Text:
Mad_Parrot's source is NOT TV, as stated in the details. More like a flv-file. Due to the thorough distortion of the file, it is easily guessed that this file's history looks something like this:

1) Streamed from TV (TCM) into a computer
2) Uploaded to a free streaming service online
3) Recorded as a flash file
4) Converted to dvdr-format

http://s14.postimage.org/5ot1e7mpb/vlcsnap_2012_05_30_06h35m20s112.png

Note: The file IS viewable though, if you're looking for the experience only.
